    • Uses of Entity in entities.mobs

      Subclasses of Entity in entities.mobs 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Boss
      The Boss class represent a Boss enemy with the properties of Enemy
      class  Enemy
      The Enemy class represents an enemy with all the properties of the Entity class Enemies have the ability to shoot and move in their own specific patterns

      The class Goon class represents an Enemy * @author nathangu
      class  Player
      The Player class represents the two users in the program that interact with the entities Player has the properties of Entity as well

    • Uses of Entity in entities.projectiles

      Subclasses of Entity in entities.projectiles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bullet
      This class represents a Bullet with the properties of Projectile
      class  Coin
      Coin represents an Entity that can be picked up by the Player The Coin has a value and can be added or deducted from a Player
      class  PowerUp
      PowerUp represents an Entity that the Player can interact with to receive benefits PowerUp provides the Player that interacts with it various buffs that increase damage or survivablity
      class  Projectile
      Projectile represents an Entity that can be interacted with It also contians the properties of Entity as well
      class  Trap
      Trap represents a Bullet that Players can summon on the other player's field of play Trap contains the properties of Bullet as well
      class  Wind
      Wind represents a Projectile that Players interact with Wind contains the same properties as Projectile
      Methods in entities.projectiles with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Trap.interact(Entity e)
      Determines the type of Trap and applies the effects on the specified Entity
      void Projectile.interact(Entity e)
      Causes the Entity hit by the Bullet to lose HP
